Method Detail

getInstance

public static SessionManager getInstance()
Return the Singleton instance for the SessionManager

Returns:
The instance of SessionManager

addSession

public boolean addSession(int password,
                          SessionRule rule)
                   throws java.security.AccessControlException
This methos is called from the applications, and it is used to add a Session Service for the application representend by password. The session was managed by the the SessionRule passed in.

Parameters:
password - the password associated to the application that calls the method
rule - the SessionRule used to manage sessions.
Returns:
true if the service was added for the application, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct.

removeSession

public boolean removeSession(int password)
                      throws java.security.AccessControlException
Remove the session service for the application represented by password.

Parameters:
password - the password associated to the application that calls the method
Returns:
true if the service was removed for the application, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct.

setRuleForApp

public boolean setRuleForApp(int password,
                             SessionRule rule)
                      throws java.security.AccessControlException
Set a new SessionRule for the application associated to the password. Now all users registered to this application will be session managed with this new SessionRule.

Parameters:
password - the password associated to the application that calls the method
rule - the SessionRule used to manage sessions.
Returns:
true if the rule was changed for the application, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct.

manageSessionFor

protected boolean manageSessionFor(java.lang.String IDUser,
                                   java.lang.String application)
This methos is called from ConnectionServer or ConnectionThread to manage session for the user of an application. This method could create a new session for the user, rescue a session for the user, reset the session or do nothing if the service for the application is not active. And all of it automatically.

Parameters:
IDUser - the ID Bluetooth represent the user we want to manage session for.
application - the name of the application used by user.
Returns:
true if the session was rescued, false otherwise.
